data.name: WTC : Recruitment Day
data.detailed_description:
Overview

WTC : Recruitment Day is a very short side-story comedy/drama interactive visual novel, based on the main "Welcome To... Chichester" series, and set in a semi-fictional world of secret organisations.

It is self-contained, and so reading other episodes is not a requirement to enjoy this game.

The Story

After Grendel Jinx is mugged, she chases after the thief, determined to retrieve her possessions - and also recruit the person responsible. For once, Grendel's lack of attention to security protocols at "The Council Of The Unseen" may have prevented further problems.

Features

  • Grendel Jinx is voiced by "Sarah"
  • Two different endings
  • Short, two chapter story (approx. around 30 minutes to complete)
  • The 'Self-Expanding Frying Pan' is back !

Rating : Off-screen violence. Some adult dialogue

Characters


Grendel Jinx and her mother.


Lorinda Ella and The Boss

data.short_description: After Grendel Jinx is mugged, she chases after the thief, determined to retrieve her possessions - and also recruit the person responsible

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 upwards
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Version 10.10+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Version: 10.10+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only) or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible sound card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or later
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or later
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible sound card

Background graphics by Mustikadewia
Character graphics by Larvinlucas
Grendel Jinx voice by Sarah (@AngelGirlAsmr)
Addition graphics by Videezy
Sound effects by Pond5 and AudioJungle
